channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? Kapa Haka Tuarua o Aotearoa 2024
channel.desc: Highlights of the most prestigious M?ori kapa haka event on the school calendar. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Toys & Pets
channel.desc: A group of cute clay figurines that are good-luck charms for tea drinkers-embark on a magical animated adventure to find a fabled mystic.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tagata Pasifika 2025
channel.desc: The show made by Pacific people, for Pacific people - The Pacific voice on New Zealand television since 1987.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Fresh 2025
channel.desc: Our favourite flavours of the Pacific are presented in a Fresh Poly-platter in this series dedicated to inspiring Islanders worldwide.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Kura Tuatahi
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Kura Tuatahi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Thailand's Wild Side
channel.desc: The need to reproduce drives all life. Birds, elephants and monkeys search for the perfect partner. But finding one is only the first step. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Matau Bros Gone Fishing
channel.desc: A lifestyle series that follows hard-case M?ori anglers, Matene, Dazza and Jeff Cleave, as they fish for knowledge and food for the table. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: H?iho Riding On
channel.desc: Lizzie Rangihuna is back to explore the nations back country and reveal the great stories from the paddock, meeting the people making a difference in their communities through their Hoiho. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?karo Tribe
channel.desc: Ta?karo Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa Rakau and Talking Pond Koka? live. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?karo Tribe
channel.desc: Ta?karo Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa Rakau and Talking Pond Koka? live. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Kura Tuatahi
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Kura Tuatahi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo Kokara
channel.desc: Tair?whiti based Tia Takarangi specialises in Te Ao M?ori communications, working for T?ranga FM. A raukura of TKKM o Te Waiu o Ng?ti Porou, Tia brings an in-depth knowledge of te reo ake o Ng?ti Porou.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo Kokara
channel.desc: Kahurangi Malcolm was schooled in total immersion M?ori at Te Raki o Pukekohe and Te Kura Kaupapa M?ori o Waiuku. Te Reo M?ori is an important part of her wh?nau and has a huia feather in her cap.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Siblings Eraia and Lahaina Kiel teach basic skills in poi, haka and other traditional M?ori performing arts. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Wharekura
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Wharekura. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Homesteads
channel.desc: Three generations of the Black family live a rural lifestyle together on their kainga 'Te Hurepo', in eastern Bay of Plenty. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Sachies Kitchen
channel.desc: Chef Sachie Nomura is in MacKenzie Country visiting High Country Salmon with comedian great Lynda Topp and she goes star gazing with Ng?i Tahu Dark Sky Project. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Hokinga Mai - The Return
channel.desc: The journey of M?ori reconnecting with their whakapapa and whenua. Gina-Lee has been longing to return to Port Levy. The day has finally come, but it's not without pitfalls. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Frontier
channel.desc: The newly acquired territory of California and the discovery of gold unleashes the largest migration in US history and ignites a vicious debate on slavery, culminating in the American Civil War. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: H?kina Te M?nuka
channel.desc: NEW: While at Waitangi the kids meet the Harmonic Resonators, who offered them a great opportunity. Balance and rest is a huge learning curve for the wh?nau. P?rina helps with her rongo? M?ori.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Imitation Game
channel.desc: PREMIERE: The story of Alan Turing, who helped crack Nazi codes during WWII but was later prosecuted for being gay.
